name: Amanda N. Skeen
body:
# Amanda N. Skeen ### 704.689.2298 ### anskeen@me.com ### anskeen.github.com ### Proficiencies * Web and Graphic Design * Motion Graphics and Video Editing * Writing for the Web * Usability Testing ### Technical Skills * HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3 * Git source code management * Comfortable with the command line, OSX development environment * Adobe Creative Suite * Avid DS, Final Cut Pro * Microsoft Office and other Windows tools ### Hendrick Automotive UX Apprenticeship * Paid apprenticeship with experienced UX professionals * Full product development lifecycle * Front end web develpment and design * Usability testing ### Newspaper Service Company Web Designer & Office Assistant * Created company website and design input for newspaper websites * Designed and created promotional ads * Managed quarterly newspaper story counts and reports ### CMS-TV 3 Production Assistant * Directed, produced and assisted with studio operations for live broadcast * Edited segments for station commercials ### Freelance ### Director & Producer's Assistant #### "Blood Done sign My Name" - Feature Film * 2nd Assistant to Jeb Stuart, Director and Mari Stuart, Producer * Assisted with various activities assigned by director and producer ### Enventys LMS Video Editor * Transcribed, logged footage and edited corporate videos ### TV Show - "Everyday Edisons" Bouncing Brain Productions * Transcribed, logged footage, organized B-roll for television episodes * Assisted with proofing commercials ### The Film Foundry Internship * Labeled Beta tapes for output and proofed color correction for shows and segments * Assisted Editors on various film clips and proofing upcoming television shows ### Education and Training * The Art Institute of Charlotte, Charlotte, NC
A.A.S Degree in Web Design & Interactive Media-2012
Deans List-December 2009 * Apple Certified Pro, New York, NY
Certification in Final Cut Pro 6, Level one * Carolina School of Broadcasting, Charlotte, NC
Certification in Television and Radio Broadcast * Gardner-Webb University, Boiling Springs, NC
Studied Communications-Radio & Television * St. Petersburg College, Tarpon Springs, FL
Studied Communications-Radio & Television * Lodestone Digital - Photoshop CS3 Fundamentals & Advanced Training * New York Film Academy - Four Week Study
